title: The Wind Boy
description: The Wind Boy is a delightful story of two refugee children, Gentian and Kat, ages eight and nine, and their artist mother, Detra, who have been separated from their father by war. When Nan, a girl from the mountains, answers Detra’s ad for household help, Kay and Gentian find a wise and guiding friend. With Nan’s arrival, wonderful experiences soon unfold. They encounter the Wind Boy, discovering that they share a troublesome problem.
author: Ethel Cook Eliot
